descript.abstract:
This table contains information about service areas for independent public transit authorities, each of which has been designated by the Minnesota State Legislature as the transit provider within each service area. Agencies represented include the Metropolitan Council (Metro Transit operating division and Metropolitan Transportation Services contracting division) and each Suburban Transit Authority Provider (previously known as "opt-outs").
These service areas are defined by complete cities or townships within a county (some cities are cut along county boundaries). Information is geographically references with the COCTU_CODE field (concatenation of 3-digit FIPS county code and 5-digit FIPS place code (CTU code)).
descript.purpose: This table can be joined to the "Counties and Cities & Townships, Twin Cities Metropolitan Area" spatial dataset using the COCTU_CODE field (concatenation of 3-digit FIPS county code and 5-digit FIPS place code). This will allow users to create maps and conduct spatial analyses with the data in this table.

theme.themekey: Transportation, Transit Services, Suburban Transit Authority Provider, Opt-Out

citeinfo.title: Counties and Cities & Townships, Twin Cities Metropolitan Area ( http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/CountiesAndCTUs.htm )

attracc.attraccr: Derived from hard copy maps. Attribute accuracy has not been verified.

dataqual.complete: 7 County Metropolitan Area of the Twin Cities. (Anoka, Carver, Dakota, Hennepin, Ramsey, Scott, and Washington Counties)

spdoinfo.indspref: COCTU_CODE: 8 digit code that is a concatenation of the 3-digit FIPS county code and 5-digit FIPS place code
spdoinfo.mgmg3til: One file for entire Twin Cities Metropolitan Area

overview.eaover:
COCTU_CODE: 8-digit code that uniquely defines every city or township within each county. This is a concatenation of the 3-digit FIPS and MN state standard county code and the 5-digit FIPS 'Place' code (which is also a Census Bureau and MetroGIS standard code for cities, townships and unorganized territories (CTUs)).
COCTU_DESC: City or Township Name
IPTA_AREAS: Independent Public Transit Authority Areas Name of the Regular Route Transit Service Provider Met Council or the Suburban Transit Authority Provider which operates independent regular route service. (text field)

distinfo.distliab: NOTICE: The Geographic Information System (GIS) Data to which this notice is attached are made available pursuant to the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act (Minnesota Statutes Chapter 13). THE GIS DATA ARE PROVIDED TO YOU AS IS AND WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY AS TO THEIR PERFORMANCE, MERCHANTABILITY, OR FITNESS FOR ANY PARTICULAR PURPOSE. The GIS Data were developed by the Metropolitan Council for its own internal business purposes. The Metropolitan Council does not represent or warrant that the GIS Data or the data documentation are error-free, complete, current, or accurate. You are responsible for any consequences resulting from your use of the GIS Data or your reliance on the GIS Data. You should consult the data documentation for this particular GIS Data to determine the limitations of the GIS Data and the precision with which the GIS Data may depict distance, direction, location, or other geographic features. If you transmit or provide the GIS Data (or any portion of it) to another user, it is recommended that the GIS Data include a copy of this disclaimer and this metadata.

stdorder.ordering:
This dataset is distributed on the internet by clicking below after 'Online Linkage'. Doing so will tell your browser to download a 'ZIP' file which will contain the following:
- dBase file - metadata for the dataset (.htm) - NOTICE.RTF, an important notice about this dataset that can be read by any word processing software.
